summary: This bill, the Deterring External Threats and Ensuring Robust Responses to Egregious and Nefarious Criminal Endeavors Act (DETERRENCE Act), aims to enhance sentencing for various federal crimes when they are directed by or coordinated with foreign governments. It focuses on offenses like kidnapping, murder-for-hire, influencing federal officials, stalking, assaulting officers, and harming the President or staff. The bill amends existing sections of Title 18 of the United States Code to include these sentence enhancements, increasing penalties based on the involvement of foreign entities.
